topic.title: PERITONEAL INVOLVEMENT INDICATOR FOR ENDOMETRIAL CANCER
topic.shortdesc: An indication of whether there is peritoneal (affecting the peritoneum) involvement for endometrial cancer during a Gynaecological Cancer Care Spell.
